welcome_message_body: Welcome to Porto-Novo, the vibrant capital city of Benin known for its rich history and unique blend of African and Portuguese influences. We invite you to explore our charming streets, vibrant markets, and beautiful architecture and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer.
